attributes.action: Ease restrictions on sale, purchase and possession of Waxed Hexamine Tablets
attributes.additional_details: These tablets are used by some steam toys, and we are concerned about the impact these new restrictions will have on the businesses that manufacture this toys.
attributes.background: We want the Government to reform restrictions on hexamine to allow for Waxed Hexamine Tablets to be sold in boxes with a maximum quantity of 3 boxes, without the need for any licence.
